title: Twitter Typography Roundup: 21 Feb 2009
content:
In case you’re not following the backchannel chatter on Twitter, I’ve grabbed a mere snapshot of some of the links being thrown around the last 24 hours or so. This is just the tip of the iceberg. Many of these sites are not new, but perhaps you’ll find something that has slipped through your typography filters.

Follow me on Twitter: [http://www.twitter.com/benson/](http://web.archive.org/web/20090609065047/http:/www.twitter.com/benson/ "http://www.twitter.com/benson/")

**TOP PICKS**

15 great typography-based objects  
 [http://www.designer-daily.com/15-great-typography-based-objects-1714](http://web.archive.org/web/20090609065047/http:/www.designer-daily.com/15-great-typography-based-objects-1714 "http://www.designer-daily.com/15-great-typography-based-objects-1714")

The Typography of Code  
 [http://blog.hamstu.com/2008/02/03/the-typography-of-code/](http://web.archive.org/web/20090609065047/http:/blog.hamstu.com/2008/02/03/the-typography-of-code/ "http://blog.hamstu.com/2008/02/03/the-typography-of-code/")

50 Mind-blowing Retro-style Photoshop Illustrations  
 [http://psd.tutsplus.com/articles/inspiration/50-mind-blowing-retro-style...](http://web.archive.org/web/20090609065047/http:/psd.tutsplus.com/articles/inspiration/50-mind-blowing-retro-style-photoshop-illustrations/ "http://psd.tutsplus.com/articles/inspiration/50-mind-blowing-retro-style-photoshop-illustrations/")

40 Brilliantly Photoshopped Print Ads  
 [http://psd.tutsplus.com/articles/web/40-brilliantly-photoshopped-print-a...](http://web.archive.org/web/20090609065047/http:/psd.tutsplus.com/articles/web/40-brilliantly-photoshopped-print-ads/ "http://psd.tutsplus.com/articles/web/40-brilliantly-photoshopped-print-ads/")

 [http://www.typographicposters.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20090609065047/http:/www.typographicposters.com/ "http://www.typographicposters.com/")

The Vignelli Canon (PDF Download)  
 [http://is.gd/g2ZD](http://web.archive.org/web/20090609065047/http:/is.gd/g2ZD "http://is.gd/g2ZD")

KERN: The iPhone game  
 [http://gadgets.boingboing.net/2009/02/17/kern-the-iphone-game.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20090609065047/http:/gadgets.boingboing.net/2009/02/17/kern-the-iphone-game.html "http://gadgets.boingboing.net/2009/02/17/kern-the-iphone-game.html")
